content: - half_double_crochet in each stitch around and making sure you do half_double_crochet ch2 half_double_crochet in the chain 2 spaces - slip_stitch to the first stitch now with the right side of your panel facing attach yarn b in top left corner work down the edge of your panel the next border round you will be joining both border sides together to enclose your ends r6 - in the blo of each side slip_stitch in each stitch around your first 3 sides of your panel - on the last side 19 blo slip_stitch chain 10 to make a loop finish row with another 19 blo slip_stitch - finish with an invisible join this pattern and photos are property of emkatcrochet and may not be altered shared or sold do not rewrite any part of this design and sell as your own design you re welcome to sell finished products made but please credit me as the designer now with the right side of your panel facing you fold one end up and sew each edge up using yarn b and a needle now turn your pouch right side out sew your button onto your pouch in the centre where your loop will be sew all ends in all finished this pattern and photos are property of emkatcrochet and may not be altered shared or sold do not rewrite any part of this design and sell as your own design you re welcome to sell finished products made but please credit me as the designer
